summary: West Ham United, based in East London, is a professional soccer club playing in the Premier League, England's top league. They moved to the London Stadium in 2016 from their old ground, the Boleyn Ground. Founded in 1895, the team has won five major trophies, including the FA Cup three times and the Europa Conference League in 2023. West Ham has never been lower than the second tier of English football. Three of their players were on England's 1966 World Cup-winning team. The club's colors are claret and sky blue.
title: West Ham United F.C.
